QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when n.encid = '' or n.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(n.encid, 'E0000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, ec.provid, n.note_date, n.sds_term, isnull(n.sds_term, '') + ';' + isnull(n.sds_location, '') + ';' + isnull(n.sds_family_member, '') +';' + isnull(n.sds_sentiment, '') as VALUE_AS_STRING from {sc}.nlp_sds_family n JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND n.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = n.encid order by cast(replace(n.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
